lore: Also known as the "Fierce Warm Egg," "Egg Slammed Into Molten Rock," or "Satan, Lord of the Underworld." This egg is more than just cookedâ€”it can withstand blazing heat and roll through lava like a fire-breathing dragon. It constantly leaks glowing yolk, though if it gets too hot, it'll lose its yolk altogether and stop oozing.
menagerieDialog: (They're nestled together, occasionally emitting soft peeping sounds.)
We may look fragile, but we'll crack some skulls!
Don't let our appearance fool you. We've got a few tricks up our... well, you know.
Our shells are tougher than they look. Bring it on!
(They're rolling around erratically, narrowly avoiding collisions.)
name: Scorched Egg
